issues.description: FAQ accordion buried below pricing won't preempt cost objections during initial evaluation
issues.rationale: Price anxiety peaks before reaching pricing section

issues.description: 3-column comparison lacks outcome-based differentiation between tiers
issues.rationale: Feature lists don't translate to business value

issues.description: 'Calm professionalism' tone conflicts with urgency SMB owners feel about growth
Customer logos without context fail to demonstrate relevant success stories
issues.rationale: SMBs need to see peers, not just brand names

issues.description: 6-testimonial grid creates decision paralysis instead of focused proof

issues.description: Serif body text at 18px contradicts modern SaaS expectations
